primary_location.name: Gillingham
primary_location.blurb: Indoor electric karting in Gillingham, Kent.

contacts.support_note: For accessibility or special requirements, please contact us in advance.

opening.days: Open all week except Monday and Tuesday (private bookings only on Mon/Tue).
opening.hours: Afternoon until 22:00 (10pm). Last session starts ~45 minutes before closing.

multi_session_deals.session_2_and_3_discount: Discounted, must be pre-booked over the phone.

promotions.saturday: Promotional discounts do not apply on Saturdays.

tracking_and_tickets.tracking_codes: Customers receive a tracking code to manage tickets.
tracking_and_tickets.gifting: Tickets can be transferred/gifted to a new code via the Customer Dashboard.

fast_answers.answer: 🎟️ Got it! If you already have tickets, you can check them here: [Customer Dashboard](https://pos.kartingcentral.co.uk/home/download/pos2/pos2/custdash.php)
🔎 Great! Use your tracking code on the [Customer Dashboard](https://pos.kartingcentral.co.uk/home/download/pos2/pos2/custdash.php) to view your tickets or gift them.
💸 No worries! You can buy new tickets here: [Book Tickets](https://www.kartingcentral.co.uk/gokarting--ticket-bookings)
📍 Our track is located in **Gillingham, Kent** — ready when you are!
📅 We're open all week **except Monday and Tuesday**. Those two days are reserved for private bookings only.
⚠️ Promotional discounts **do not apply on Saturdays**.
🕒 We're open **from the afternoon until 22:00 (10PM)**.
🏁 Our **Gillingham track is fully indoor**, perfect rain or shine!
⚡ We use **electric go karts** that reach speeds of up to **40mph**!
📏 For **adult karting**, you must be **over 5ft (152cm)** tall.
🧒 Junior karting starts from **127cm** in height.
👟 Yes — **shoes do count toward height** for karting requirements.
🧤 All gear is included — **helmet, balaclava, and kart rental** are covered in your price!
🎁 Use our **gifting system** to transfer or gift tickets to a new code — all from the [Customer Dashboard](https://pos.kartingcentral.co.uk/home/download/pos2/pos2/custdash.php)
🏎️ Each session can be up to **20 laps**, depending on lap times. For a typical 3-session day, expect around **44+ laps total**.
🏎️ We allow **up to 10 karts on the track at the same time** for safety and performance.
📅 Book directly here: [Book Experience](https://pos.kartingcentral.co.uk/home/download/pos2/pos2/book_experience.php)
🎉 Yes! We host **birthday parties** and can **cater food** if you let us know in advance.
🏁 We have an **F1 racing simulator** at Gillingham! Get **50% off** when you use Karting Central tickets!
🎫 Each **Karting Central ticket** includes **1 full session** of racing.
💥 Sessions 2 and 3 are available at **discounted prices**, but they must be **pre-booked** to secure the deal. Booking is done **over the phone**.

💸 Session 3 pricing depends on your group size:
- 1–4 people: **£12**
- 5–8 people: **£11**
- 9–12 people: **£10**
The more people, the cheaper the third session!
